groups.label: WindowConfirm_FrameEdit_UnityPalette_LayerMode
groups.text:
Apply this page's 
paper color and 
color palette settings 
to all other pages?

groups.label: WindowConfirm_Save_IsQuit
groups.text:
The flipnote has been edited.
Quit without saving?

groups.label: WindowConfirm_Memo_Over
groups.text:
This folder is full of flipnotes.

Cannot save in this folder.

groups.label: WindowConfirm_FrameEdit_UnityParallax
groups.text:
Apply this page's
3D settings to all 
other pages?

groups.label: WindowConfirm_Save_SD_InfoAvi
groups.text:
Saved to the SD Card,
in the location displayed
on the upper screen.

You can view the video with
Nintendo 3DS Camera.

groups.label: WindowConfirm_Save_SD_Info
groups.text:
Saved to the SD Card. 
See the upper screen for the 
folder location.

groups.label: WindowConfirm_Save_IsQuit_Icon
groups.text:
The icon has been edited.
Do you want to discard changes
and choose a different icon?

groups.label: WindowConfirm_Initialize_SaveDataClear
groups.text:
Reset user data?

Your flipnotes will
not be deleted.

groups.label: WindowConfirm_Initialize_ClearSavedata
groups.text:
If you continue, the save
data will be reset. Is this OK?

Note: Original settings will
be restored. Your existing
flipnotes will not be deleted.

groups.label: WindowConfirm_FrameEdit_UnityPalette_ColorMode
groups.text:
Apply this page's 
paper color to all
other pages?

groups.label: WindowConfirm_Initialize_SaveDataClear_Real
groups.text:
Are you sure you want
to reset your user data?

groups.label: WindowConfirm_Initialize_PatchDownload
groups.text:
This software must be updated
before it can be used.

Do you want to download
the newest version of this
software now?

groups.label: WindowConfirm_Delete_Folder_Confirm
groups.text:
Delete the folder and
its contents?

You cannot recover deleted
folders or flipnotes.

groups.label: WindowConfirm_Save_MemoSave_Sns
groups.text:
This flipnote hasn't been
saved. Are you sure you
want to open the browser?

Note: It's recommended to save
your flipnotes before using
Nintendo 3DS Image Share.

groups.label: WindowConfirm_Save_Browser_Sns
groups.text:
In order to use Nintendo 3DS
Image Share, the Internet
browser must be opened.

Is this OK?

groups.label: WindowConfirm_Delete_Memo_Confirm
groups.text:
Delete the flipnote?

Deleted flipnotes
cannot be recovered.
